mapper.select: SELECT sys_resource.id as id, sys_resource.name as name, sys_resource.parent_id as parent_id, sys_resource.type as type, sys_resource.url as url, sys_resource.permission as permission, sys_resource.color as color, sys_resource.icon as icon, sys_resource.sort as sort, sys_resource.verification as verification, sys_resource.create_date as create_date, sys_resource.log_is_save as log_is_save FROM sys_user LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ON sys_user.id = sys_user_role.uid LEFT JOIN sys_role ON sys_user_role.rid = sys_role.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_resource ON sys_role.id= sys_role_resource.rid LEFT JOIN sys_resource ON sys_role_resource.pid = sys_resource.id WHERE sys_user.id = #{userId}
